tool_description: Generate strong, unique, and customizable passwords with our Password Generator API.
name: Password Generator

api_list.name: Generate Password
Generate Password
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://password-generator18.p.rapidapi.com/generate-password"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "password-generator18.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://password-generator18.p.rapidapi.com/generate-password"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
